panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Amount of memory used (ignoring page cache)

targets.expr: 100 * ((sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="free"}) + sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="cached"}) + sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="buffered"})) / sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host"}))

panels.title: Memory Used

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (1 min average)
panels.title: CPU System Load (1m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: CPU System Load (5m avg)

targets.expr: sum(collectd_memory{instance=~"$host"}) - sum(collectd_memory{instance=~"$host", memory="free"}) - sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="cached"}) - sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="buffered"})
